ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen one, a 26th level Paladin on MM.  All one colour as well, none of this red legs, bronze arms and black arms.  All nice and silver.
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen one, a 26th level Paladin on MM. All one colour as well, none
of this red legs, bronze arms and black arms. All nice and silver.

> ----------
> From: schlaban yocksovik[SMTP:anonymaste@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 4:08 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
>
> From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>
>
> >From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> <SNIP>
>
>
> heheh tell me about it. Never seen an uglier but in the game,
> not eaven a troll butt.
> hehe, havent seena nyone in plate though
>
> >3) Human males look TERRIBLE in leather and chain, but look quite
> >impressive
> >in plate mail.
> >
> >Anyway, I think a human warrior in full plate with a tower shield will
> look
> >quite impressive. What is the weight of a full set of bronze vs. black
> >Iron
> >vs. normal plate? thanks.
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: schlaban yocksovik[SMTP:anonymaste@...]
> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 10:30 PM
> > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
> > >
> > > From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
> > >
> > > hmm waste of time learning bash cus you get dual wield?
> > > I have to dissagree with you big time.
> > > The sole purpose of a higher level warrior is not being able to
> >dualwield
> > > and smack the enemy with loads of damage.
> > > Thats the casters job, warriors are tanks and should have rockin armor
>
> >and
> > > a
> > > shield for protection and to bash with to stunn and interupt casters
> >IMHO.
> > > Sure dualwield is _realy_ good and thats a skill to keep maxed too, it
> > > rocks
> > > on easier mobs, but when the s#&t hits the fan that bash and shield ac
> > > might
> > > be the thing saving your teams but.
> > >
> > > ps
> > > I dont want to start a flame war, just my oppinion.
> > > ds
> > >
> > > vashi
> > > >From: Kyle Buffington <KBuffington@...>
> > > >
> > > >Slam is what the larger races get and Bash is what the smaller races
> >get
> > > >with a shield.
> > > >If you are a warrior like me then you are wasting your time with bash
>
> >if
> > > >you
> > > >are going to dual wield when you hit level 15.
> > > >I am not positive if it is a waste of time with a Barbarian.
> > > >that is my understanding into bash and slam.
> > > >
> > > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > > From: Patricia Halas [SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> > > > > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 8:11 AM
> > > > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
